text: @SenSchumer You still don't know what is going on in your state. Homeless are taking over the subways, patients are being sent back to nursing homes with COVID19. When the President put all those beds in.  Who has blood on his hands? Test, democrat fail. We will take our Republic back.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
